name: Snack for cat
title: Felix · Snack for cat · Party Mix - Delicious treats
description: Felix Snack for cat Party Mix - Delicious treats There's more to it than that!  FELIX Party Mix contains proteins, vitamins and Omega 6 fatty acids, which help your cat to live a healthy and happy life.

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Meat and animal derivatives (32%), Cereals, Oils and fats, Vegetable protein extracts, Fish and fish derivatives (2% of which are 0.5% Salmon, 0.5% Trout ,0.2% Pollock), minerals, Yeasts.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/kg: Vit A: 32000; Vit D3: 1040; Vit E: 170; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 84); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 1.3); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 8.8); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 30); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 77); Sodium selenite: (Se: 0.091). Colourants and Antioxidants.

usageInformation.usage: Share more happy moments full of mischief with your little rascal with the new FELIX Party Mix - the irresistibly colorful mix of treats in many different shapes that smell delicious and taste irresistibly delicious.
usageInformation.additionalInformation: Composition: meat and animal by-products, cereals, oils and fats, vegetable protein extracts, fish and fish by-products (2% - corresponds to 3.5% rehydrated, with 0.5% salmon, 0.5% pollack and 0.5% trout), minerals, sugar, yeast

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide :Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available.For your cat’s health, respect the feeding guide and adjust your main meal accordingly.Supervise your cat when giving him/her the treat.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complementary pet food for adult cats

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a dry and cool place
